```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
df_raw <- read.csv('data/17-19survey-person.csv')
glimpse(df_raw)
```

```{r}
household <- read.csv('data/2017-2019-pr2-1-Household.csv')
glimpse(household)
```

```{r}
household%>%
  select(prev_home_rgcname) 
```
```{r}
household%>%
  select(final_home_rgcnum) 

```


```{r}
# queries for suburbanised people

household %>%
  filter(sample_county == 'King') %>%
  filter(prev_home_wa == 'Yes, previous home was in Washington')
```


```{r}
household %>%
  group_by(brands) %>%
  summarise(cnt = n()) %>%
  mutate(freq = round(cnt / sum(cnt), 3)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(freq))
```
